creator: michael.serisier@free.fr
text:
If you create a test plan with several WebService(SOAP) Requests, the WSDL URL
field is not reset when moving from on request to another in the tree. Whatever
you type in last remains as the value you see for each request.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
This is fixed in the HEAD branch of CVS, which is due for release as 2.1 soon.

The SOAP sampler in 2.0 branch is old and probably won't be fixed.
